unnormalised: Hey! Been exploring Ayurveda lately. Heard amazing things about treatments in Kerala. My cousin, Priya, went to Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala and said it was life-changing. Thinking of trying a Panchakarma during Diwali. Anyone tried specific treatments for stress or joint pain? Maybe sipping some warm masala chai after? Or having some yummy biryani?
